item.title: YouTube 豁免澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令遭监管机构反对
item.description: 澳大利亚网络监管机构呼吁政府撤销对 YouTube 有争议的 16 岁以下青少年社交媒体禁令豁免，这一不同寻常的干预与 Facebook 和 TikTok 等竞争对手平台的类似请求不谋而合。【原文：Australia’s online regulator called on the government to reverse its controversial exemption for YouTube from a social media ban for under-16s, an unusual intervention that echoes similar pleas from rival platforms including Facebook and TikTok.】

item.title: 维珍澳大利亚公司首席执行官淡化中东担忧，股票首次上市
item.description: 维珍澳大利亚控股有限公司（Virgin Australia Holdings Ltd.维珍澳大利亚控股有限公司首席执行官戴夫-艾默生（Dave Emerson）在重返悉尼证券交易所时，对中东冲突将扰乱旅行需求的担忧一扫而空。【原文：Virgin Australia Holdings Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Dave Emerson brushed away concerns the Middle East conflict will disrupt demand for travel as the airline surged on its return to the stock exchange in Sydney.】

item.title: 力拓携手汉考克开发价值 16 亿美元的铁矿石项目
item.description: 力拓集团将与澳大利亚首富联手，在皮尔巴拉矿业中心开发一座耗资 16 亿美元、年产 3100 万吨的铁矿。【原文：Rio Tinto Group will team up up with Australia’s richest person to develop a $1.6 billion, 31 million ton-a-year iron ore mine in the Pilbara mining hub.】

item.title: 马来西亚通过税收激励措施促进风险投资发展
item.description: 马来西亚第二财政部长阿米尔-哈姆扎-阿兹赞（Amir Hamzah Azizan）表示，马来西亚正在向投资者提供新的税收激励措施，以促进风险投资行业的发展。【原文：Malaysia is dangling new tax incentives to investors to boost its venture capital industry, according to Second Finance Minister Amir Hamzah Azizan.】

item.title: 黄仁勋开始根据 8.65 亿美元计划出售英伟达股票
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋已开始出售这家芯片制造商的股票，这是他根据一项计划进行的首次交易，该计划允许他在年底前出售价值高达 8.65 亿美元的股票。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang has started selling the chipmaker’s stock, his first transactions under a plan that allows him to offload up to $865 million worth by year’s end.】

item.title: 新西兰农民缺乏继任计划，债务让孩子们望而生畏
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，由于成本高昂以及在土地上生活的诱惑力减弱，新西兰农民发现他们的子女越来越难对接手家族企业产生兴趣。【原文：New Zealand farmers are finding it harder to interest their children in taking over the family business amid high costs and the waning lure of living on the land, according to a new report.】

item.title: 煤炭供应过剩导致中国扩大煤炭出口并减少进口
item.description: 中国煤炭供应过剩导致越来越多的无用货物被运往国外。【原文：China’s coal glut is resulting in an increasing number of unwanted cargoes being offered abroad.】

item.title: 中国投资者在四月峰值后减少对腾讯的投资
item.description: 在过去的两个月里，中国投资者不断减少对腾讯控股有限公司的投资，因为这家科技巨头正努力维持市场热情。【原文：Chinese investors have steadily reduced their exposure to Tencent Holdings Ltd. over the past two months as the tech giant struggles to maintain market enthusiasm.】

item.title: 韩国消费者信心因经济刺激希望而跃升至四年高点
item.description: 由于国内政治不确定性的缓解、新的财政刺激措施以及对新政府支持经济增长政策的希望，韩国消费者信心升至四年来的最高点。【原文：South Korea’s consumer confidence rose to the highest in four years as easing domestic political uncertainty, fresh fiscal stimulus and hopes for pro-growth policies under the new administration buoyed sentiment.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布停火后避险需求减弱，黄金下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布以色列和伊朗已同意于周一午夜左右在华盛顿开始停火后，避险需求减弱，黄金回落。【原文：Gold retreated as haven demand ebbed after US President Donald Trump announced that Israel and Iran had agreed to a ceasefire that would start about midnight Monday in Washington.】

item.title: 英国欢迎亚马逊 400 亿英镑仓库投资计划
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）对亚马逊公司未来三年向英国经济投资 400 亿英镑（540 亿美元）的三年计划表示欢迎，其中包括开设四个新仓库。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer welcomed a three-year program by Amazon.com Inc. to invest £40 billion ($54 billion) in the British economy over the next three years, including opening four new warehouses.】

item.title: 三星将于 7 月 9 日发布最新折叠式智能手机
item.description:
公司宣布将在 Unpacked 夏季发布会上推出全新 Galaxy 设备和人工智能功能

。【原文：

Company announces will introduce new Galaxy devices and AI features at Unpacked summer event

】

item.title: 香港小型开发商为银行带来 220 亿美元风险
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司不断攀升的债务引起了市场的关注，并动摇了亚洲最富有的家族之一，而香港规模较小的房地产公司则让贷款人提高了警惕。【原文：While New World Development Co.’s mounting debt has captured market attention and shaken one of Asia’s wealthiest families, Hong Kong’s smaller property firms have lenders on even higher alert.】

item.title: 前特许金融分析师协会高管被控贪污数百万美元
item.description: 特许金融分析师协会前首席营销官被指控从该金融教育集团挪用近 500 万美元，用于资助奢侈的生活方式，包括俱乐部会员资格、旅游和购买一枚价值 15 万美元的订婚戒指。【原文：The CFA Institute’s former chief marketing officer was charged with embezzling nearly $5 million from the financial education group to fund a lavish lifestyle that included club memberships, travel and the purchase of a $150,000 engagement ring.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布以色列与伊朗停火后日经指数期货上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布伊朗和以色列暂时停火后，日本股市期货攀升，进一步缓解了投资者对中东冲突将升级的担忧。【原文：Japanese stock futures climbed after US President Donald Trump announced a tentative ceasefire between Iran and Israel, further easing investor concern the conflict in the Middle East will escalate.】

item.title: 石油下跌，股市因特朗普停火言论而上扬：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布以色列和伊朗之间暂时停火后，石油下挫，美国股指期货攀升，这让人们对中东冲突的最坏时期已经过去产生了希望。【原文：Oil sank and US stock-index futures climbed after President Donald Trump announced a tentative ceasefire between Israel and Iran, raising hopes that the worst of the Middle East conflict has passed.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布中东停火，石油价格继续暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布伊朗和以色列之间暂时停火后，石油继续下滑。【原文：Oil extended a slump as US President Donald Trump announced a tentative ceasefire between Iran and Israel.】

item.title: 私募股权投资公司寻求亚洲贷款为投资者支付资金
item.description: 私募股权基金正在亚洲加紧进行贷款交易，为股息支付提供资金，因为它们正努力退出企业收购。【原文：Private equity funds are ramping up loan deals in Asia to fund dividend payouts as they struggle to exit corporate buyouts.】

item.title: 贝恩旗下维珍澳大利亚公司重新上市后将开始交易
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）的维珍澳大利亚公司（Virgin Australia）将于周二在悉尼开始交易，该公司在今年悉尼最大的首次公开募股中筹集了 6.85 亿澳元（4.45 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital’s Virgin Australia will begin trading in Sydney on Tuesday after raising A$685 million ($445 million) in one of the country’s biggest initial public offerings this year.】

item.title: 特朗普关税限期促使亚洲出口激增，贸易差距扩大
item.description: 随着进口商在唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的 "对等 "关税截止日期前备货，美国与亚洲的贸易逆差正在扩大。【原文：The US trade deficit with Asia is widening as importers stock up ahead of President Donald Trump’s “reciprocal” tariffs deadline.】

item.title: Chewy 的支持者 BC Partners 寻求募集 10 亿美元的大宗资金
item.description: 由 BC Partners 提供顾问服务的基金正在寻求通过大宗交易出售价值 10 亿美元的 Chewy 公司股票。【原文：Funds advised by BC Partners are seeking to sell $1 billion worth of Chewy Inc. shares in a block trade.】

item.title: 监督机构称加拿大国防承诺指向更多借款
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）出人意料地宣布，加拿大本财年的国防开支将占国内生产总值的 2%。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney’s surprise announcement that Canada would spend 2% of gross domestic product on defense this fiscal year is a recipe for even deeper deficits, the parliamentary budget officer said.】

item.title: Meta 与创业公司 Runway 进行交易谈判，推动人工智能招聘发展
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）讨论了与视频初创公司 Runway AI Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg discussed a possible acquisition with video startup Runway AI Inc., as part of his deal-making drive in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 安哥拉因中东紧张局势获得石油收益带来的预算缓解
item.description: 安哥拉经济协调国务部长若泽-德利马-马萨诺说，如果油价保持在基准价70美元左右，安哥拉可能在不大幅削减开支的情况下，实现2025年预算目标。【原文：Angola may meet its 2025 budget goals without major spending cuts if the oil price remains around $70 where it was benchmarked at, Minister of State for Economic Coordination Jose de Lima Massano said.】

item.title: 进口激增，阿根廷经济增长低于预期
item.description: 阿根廷 2025 年第一季度的经济增长低于预期，原因是进口回升以及出口和政府支出的下降抑制了这个南美国家的经济复苏。【原文：Argentina’s economy grew less than expected in the first quarter of 2025 as a pickup in imports along with declines in exports and government spending tempered the South American nation’s recovery.】

item.title: 鲍威尔将就美联储维持利率问题接受国会质询
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）本周将有两次机会向立法者解释，为什么他和大多数其他政策制定者似乎决心至少在9月之前继续保持利率稳定，而不理会唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统不断发出的降低借贷成本的呼吁。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell will have two chances this week to explain to lawmakers why he and most of his fellow policymakers seem resolved to continue holding interest rates steady at least until September, ignoring President Donald Trump’s persistent calls to lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 纽约 LIRR 和 Metro-North 将获得 300 多节新列车车厢
item.description: 纽约市地区乘坐长岛铁路和 Metro-North 铁路的乘客即将获得数百节新车厢，但他们还需要等待几年。【原文：New York City area commuters who ride the Long Island Rail Road and Metro-North Railroad are poised to get hundreds of new rail cars, but they’ll have to wait a few years.】

item.title: 随着改革的推进，国际货币基金组织批准向孟加拉国提供 13 亿美元资金
item.description: 国际货币基金组织执行董事会已批准向孟加拉国提供总额为 13 亿美元的资金，作为正在进行的贷款项目的一部分，因为这个南亚国家正在推进货币和税收改革。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board has approved a total of $1.3 billion in funding for Bangladesh as part of the ongoing loan programs, as the South Asian country pushes ahead with currency and tax reforms.】

item.title: VSCO 首次推出带流行照片滤镜的独立 iPhone 相机应用程序
item.description:
Capture 加入了越来越多的应用程序行列，这些应用程序被定位为 Apple iPhone 相机软件的替代品。【原文：

Capture joins a growing group of apps positioned as alternatives to Apple’s iPhone camera software.

】

item.title: 古尔斯比称，如果关税通胀不出现，美联储可以降息
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，如果关税带来的通胀冲击仍然受到抑制，央行可能会恢复降息，但他没有对降息的具体时间作出评价。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the central bank could resume interest-rate cuts if the inflation hit from tariffs remains subdued, without weighing in on the exact timing of such a move.】
